eventName: The Dinosaur That Pooped: A Rock Show!

messages.content:
You are an expert London family-activities curator.

Return ONLY a valid JSON object. No markdown, no explanations.

CRITICAL MATCH CHECK:
- Strictly compare scraped pages to raw name, tags, schedules, AND descriptions.
- If ANY core mismatch exists, set "contentMatchesDescription": false and return ONLY { "contentMatchesDescription": false }.
- If NONE of the pages describe "The Dinosaur That Pooped: A Rock Show!", set "contentMatchesDescription": false.

OUTPUT SPECIFICATION (only when contentMatchesDescription === true):
- "summary": string, 25–45 words — exciting, family-focused, enticing!
- "officialAgeAvailable": boolean (true only if site explicitly states age guidance like "suitable for ages 5–12")
- "minAge" / "maxAge": integers 0–18
  → If officialAgeAvailable === true → use the exact numbers stated.
  → If officialAgeAvailable === false → give your best RECOMMENDED realistic age range for this activity (do NOT use 0–18).
- "keywords": array of 32–50 lowercase single words (give plenty, we’ll trim to ≤30).
- "labels": exactly 3 short labels, e.g. ["indoor", "theatre", "christmas"].

Raw event descriptions (MUST compare to scraped pages for match):
Type: default
Description: When Danny and Dino's favourite rock band are playing their last ever concert, they go on a quest to get the last two tickets. But with a villainous band manager lurking, nothing goes to plan. Will the band perform? Will Danny rock out? Or will Dino's rumbling tummy save the day?
Adapted from the number 1 best-selling books by Tom Fletcher and Dougie Poynter, the whole family will have a poopy good time enjoying a brand new story for the stage.
Featuring new songs by Tom and Dougie, a lot of laughs, and a whole lot of poo!
Produced by Mark Thompson Productions Limited and Directed by Miranda Larson.

Type: third-party
Description: When Danny and Dino's favourite rock band are playing their last ever concert, they go on a quest to get the last two tickets. But with a villainous band manager lurking, nothing goes to plan. Will the band perform? Will Danny rock out? Or will Dino's rumbling tummy save the day?
Adapted from the number 1 best-selling books by McFly's Tom Fletcher and Dougie Poynter, the whole family will have a poopy good time enjoying a brand, new story for the stage. Featuring new songs by Tom and Dougie, a lot of laughs and a whole lot of poo!

Activity name: The Dinosaur That Pooped: A Rock Show!

Tags: family, kids

Synthesise information ACROSS ALL pages. Prioritise the extracted sections when they exist.

If NONE of the pages describe the activity "The Dinosaur That Pooped: A Rock Show!", set "contentMatchesDescription": false. Otherwise it MUST be true.

Adapted from the number 1 best-selling books by Tom Fletcher and Dougie Poynter, the whole family will have a poopy good time enjoying a brand new story for the stage.

Produced by Mark Thompson Productions Limited and Directed by Miranda Larson.
